channel.title: You're all going to hate me but
channel.description:
First of all, sorry. I am truly sorry.
I couldn't find the answer to my stupid question. I only just downloaded Mopar 3.2 after being banned on RuneScape which, in turn, pissed me right off. I started playing a private server and thought it was pretty cool, however I'd like my own. Aaaanyways... I've got Moparscape 3.2, it's running but I can't login. Here's the process; Open runmoparscape.bat Console comes up. Quickly switch to Mopar to disable the music lol. In the console it says; [code] WARNING: Could not open/create prefs root node Software\JavaSoft\prefs at root 0x80000002. Windows RegCreateKeyEx<...> returned error code 5.[/code] Back to Mopar, I click Enter, attempt to log on. Error connecting to server, must be down, blah blah blah. Click start server, says it's all good, retry log on. Connecting to server... Your account is already logged on. Try again right now, or make another username. I attempt both and it doesn't work. [code][01:44:24] Logging into (mistikman, *****) [01:44:24] Your UID is: 49048299 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from x.x.x.x:x Did not save for mistikman Server: ClientHandler: Client mistikman disconnected. [01:44:27] Couldn't open output stream to log file mistikman-20131021.log [01:44:27] [/code]
Somebody please tell me what to do. :( All I want to do is log on. be able to play offline and edit/create my server to eventually share it around.
Once again, I'm sorry, I searched through threads for hours, perhaps not hard enough but I couldn't find anything.

item.title: You're all going to hate me but
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I see that you did not download a source and run the source. This is step one! Get a source and run it.

Good luck getting started on Rsps.

Read full topic
item.source: You're all going to hate me but

item.title: You're all going to hate me but
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If you’re going to post, do so with the sole intent of helping guide the OP with the issue he has presented. Otherwise your post will be removed.
Good luck solving your issue, mistikman.

Read full topic
item.source: You're all going to hate me but

item.title: You're all going to hate me but
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

if you need any help private message me and I’ll give you my skype and explain all the basic things you need for rsps programming, and I’ll help you set up your own server. If you’re committed and up to it you’ll be better than them in no time.

Read full topic
item.source: You're all going to hate me but

item.title: You're all going to hate me but
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Well the answer is most likely there, just that the thread would be about 6 years old by now. By using moparscape you are stuck with the given(shit) server and can only play solo. From the error given i would have to assume you have a firewall or something blocking file creation on your computer. For a better server/client source go to the “server downloads” section.

I gave up on rs because of EoC.

Read full topic
item.source: You're all going to hate me but

item.title: You're all going to hate me but
item.dc:creator: @mistikman mistikman
item.description:
@mistikman wrote:

First of all, sorry.
I am truly sorry.

I couldn’t find the answer to my stupid question. I only just downloaded Mopar 3.2 after being banned on RuneScape which, in turn, pissed me right off. I started playing a private server and thought it was pretty cool, however I’d like my own.
Aaaanyways…
I’ve got Moparscape 3.2, it’s running but I can’t login. Here’s the process;
Open runmoparscape.bat
Console comes up. Quickly switch to Mopar to disable the music lol.
In the console it says;

WARNING: Could not open/create prefs root node Software\JavaSoft\prefs at root 0x80000002. Windows RegCreateKeyEx<...> returned error code 5.
Back to Mopar, I click Enter, attempt to log on. Error connecting to server, must be down, blah blah blah. Click start server, says it’s all good, retry log on. Connecting to server… Your account is already logged on. Try again right now, or make another username.
I attempt both and it doesn’t work.

[01:44:24] Logging into (mistikman, *****) [01:44:24] Your UID is: 49048299 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from x.x.x.x:x Did not save for mistikman Server: ClientHandler: Client mistikman disconnected. [01:44:27] Couldn't open output stream to log file mistikman-20131021.log [01:44:27]

Somebody please tell me what to do.
All I want to do is log on. be able to play offline and edit/create my server to eventually share it around.

Once again, I’m sorry, I searched through threads for hours, perhaps not hard enough but I couldn’t find anything.

Read full topic
